member.name: ASSOCIATIONLEVEL
member.summary: Specifies the source of the default association for a file name extension. Used by methods of the interface.

member.name: ASSOCIATIONLEVEL.AL_EFFECTIVE
member.summary: The effective default for the current user. This value should be used by most applications.

member.name: ASSOCIATIONLEVEL.AL_USER
member.summary: The per-user default application association. If this value is used and no per-user default is declared, the calling method fails with a value of HRESULT_FROM_WIN32(ERROR_NO_ASSOCIATION).
